REM ***** BASIC ***** option explicit
Sub Formular_init() init_Form_Einstellungen() init_Form_Users() init_Form_Steuerung() init_Form_DocumentTyp() End Sub
Sub init_Form_Einstellungen() sSQL1="select * from Einstellungen where EinstellungsID="& iEinstellungsID_lokal oForm_Einstellungen.DataSourceName=sDataSource oForm_Einstellungen.NavigationBarMode=0 oForm_Einstellungen.CommandType=2 oForm_Einstellungen.Command=sSQL1 oForm_Einstellungen.Cycle=1 oForm_Einstellungen.AllowInserts=false End Sub
Sub init_Form_Users() sSQL1="select * from Users where UserID="& iUserID_lokal oForm_Users.DataSourceName=sDataSource oForm_Users.NavigationBarMode=0 oForm_Users.CommandType=2 oForm_Users.Command=sSQL1 oForm_Users.Cycle=1 oForm_Users.AllowInserts=false End Sub
Sub init_Form_Steuerung() sSQL1="select * from Steuerung "&_ " where ClientID <= "& (iUserID_lokal*40) &_ " and ClientID > "& (iUserID_lokal*40)-40 &_ " order by ClientID ASC" oForm_Steuerung.DataSourceName=sDataSource oForm_Steuerung.NavigationBarMode=0 oForm_Steuerung.CommandType=2 oForm_Steuerung.Command=sSQL1 oForm_Steuerung.Cycle=1 oForm_Steuerung.AllowInserts=true End Sub
Sub init_Form_DocumentTyp() sSQL1="select * from Document_Typ where Document_TypID=:a" oForm_DocumentTyp.DataSourceName=sDataSource oForm_DocumentTyp.NavigationBarMode=0 oForm_DocumentTyp.CommandType=2 oForm_DocumentTyp.Command=sSQL1 oForm_DocumentTyp.Cycle=1 oForm_DocumentTyp.AllowInserts=true End Sub
